description:
One day at the literature club, while play-pretending being possessed by some otherworldly power, http://anidb.net/ch68478 [July] actually summons superpowers onto everyone at the club: http://anidb.net/ch68477 [Chifuyu] (materializes objects), http://anidb.net/ch68480 [Tomoyo] (controls the flow of time), http://anidb.net/ch68479 [Hatoko] (manipulates the five elements), http://anidb.net/ch68481 [Sayumi] (restores original state), and July (summons a useless dark flame).
At the club they perform a monthly superpower check-up, just to be sure they can control their new powers, should the need ever arise. When the student council president, http://anidb.net/ch69389 [Mirei], suddenly appears at the club for an "inspection", July accuses her of actually "surveying" them... and that turns out to be the case, and she has the ability to steal superpowers. Further investigation reveals that Mirei received her powers only recently, whereas the club members have them for six months now. Could some mysterious outside force be turning normal students at their school into superpower-wielders?
— written by foo2

REGULAR.description:
The members of Senkou High School`s literature club become shocked when Andou July, a boy usually known for his chuunibyou delusions, suddenly develops superpowers of his own. Six months later, each of the club members have since developed their own superpowers, which they put to the test in their monthly check-up. When student council member Kudou Mirei comes to check on the club, she ends up misinterpreting July`s chuunibyou behavior and inadvertently reveals that she herself has developed superpowers as well. Mirei challenges the club to a superpower battle, using her own ability to steal July`s "Dark and Dark" ability, only to find it to be nothing more than a useless lukewarm flame. With the other members knowing not to show off their powers before her, they easily beat Mirei in a physical match. Learning that Mirei learned of the club`s powers from an anonymous text, the group become curious about just who sent it. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 異変[アルファ エピソード]

REGULAR.description:
Mirei receives an elaborately-phrased letter from July, intended to give her ability the name of "Grateful Robber", but misreads it as "Grateful Lover", misinterpreting the letter as a love letter and declaring herself to now be July`s girlfriend, leading the entire club, July included, baffled. After having to deal with both Mirei`s over-the-top affections and the jealous glares of the other girls, July explains the situation to Mirei, who seems heartbroken from being turned down. As Kanzaki Tomoyo comes to cheer up July during his moment of guilt, he explains he chose that particular name for Mirei`s power so it would match the others and show that she was one of their friends. Afterwards, July receives an e-mail from Mirei apologising for the misunderstanding and accepting the name he gave her power.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 誤想[ミスコンセプション]

REGULAR.description:
The literature club have a recreation day spent playing tennis with their abilities. Later, as July goes off to search for his misplaced "Bloody Bible", the other girls reflect on how he, despite his odd behavior, has been helping them all this time. While retrieving his book, July comes across an alumni named Kiryuu Hajime, who seems to share his passion for chuunibyou naming. He is later revealed to be Tomoyo`s older half-brother who left home a year ago. The next day, honorary literature club member Himeki Chifuyu appears before July, stating she has quit elementary school.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 邂逅[ランデブーポイント]

REGULAR.description:
July carried Chifuyu on his back to her school before he met up with Kuki Madoka and proceed to go to go to his own school. Later, the club use Chifuyu`s "World Create" ability to dress up in various cosplay outfits, after which Chifuyu`s aunt, teacher Satomi Shiharu, mentions that Chifuyu had left school early. Later, Chifuyu shows up at July`s house after getting into a fight with her friend, Kuki Madoka, who told her not to spend time with the Literature Club anymore. Things get worse between them due to Chifuyu being unable to tell Madoka about her powers, leading her to believe she likes them more than her. July attempts his own dubious manner of trying to get the two to make up, but Chifuyu accomplishes this on her own by having Shiharu help her win Madoka a plush to match with hers. Afterwards, Chifuyu reveals that her wanting to quit elementary school was from a desire to skip grades and enter high school alongside the other members. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 奇行[カプリシャスレディ]

REGULAR.description:
July buys himself a guitar, which he risks in a game against Chifuyu. Whilst retrieving his bag later that day, July learns that Tomoyo is trying to become a novel author, being surprisingly supportive. Tomoyo feels pleased the next day when she passes the first round of a light novel award, so July invites her to lunch on the weekend to celebrate. As the two spend time together on what many would see as a "date", element manipulator Kushikawa Hatoko is shocked to see them together. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 厨二[センシティブエイジ]

REGULAR.description:
After working with the Literature Club members to make a personalized video game for July`s birthday, Takanashi Sayumi, who has the power to revert things to their original state, catches a cold. July pays Sayumi a visit at her house, where he meets her younger sister Maiya, though Sayumi attitude suddenly changes when July bring up how she was the student council in middle school. The next day, after July hears from Maiya about how Sayumi had originally wanted to join the student council during high school, Mirei theorizes she may have turned it down due to her powers. This leads July to recall an incident that happened ten months ago in which Sayumi, who suggested they use her "Root of Origin" ability to remove everyone`s powers, battled against July who was against it. The result of that battle showed that Sayumi`s power could not erase July`s Dark and Dark, as their powers were meant to be accepted as part of themselves. Sayumi later explains that her change in attitude was purely due to her medication, also stating she has no regrets turning down the student council for the sake of her fellow club members. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 罪悪[ヴァイスペナルティ]

REGULAR.description:
Hatoko is invited to July`s house to make dinner for him and his sister, but gets downhearted when July decides to stay at school to talk with Tomoyo about her writing. Hatoko gets angry at July when he refuses to tell him what he talked about with Tomoyo and snaps at him, going on a rant about how she just can`t understand his chuunibyou behavior before running off. As July goes off in search for Hatoko, he worries that he might have been putting stress on her the entire time, but Tomoyo slaps some sense into him and helps him search. Meanwhile, Hatoko comes across another Chuunibyou, who teaches her not to worry about not being able to understand chuunibyou, before using his own power to knock Hatoko unconscious. With July having no luck in finding Hatoko, Sayumi decides to bring her Root of Origin to the next stage in order to find her. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 覚醒[ジャガーノートオン]

REGULAR.description:
A few weeks earlier, Hajime is seen using his "Pinpoint Abyss" ability to defeat another ability user, returning him to regular life with no memory of his ability. It is revealed that this "Fairy War" between superpower humans is for the entertainment of a group of fairies, with the last eight users standing being granted a wish. One of these fairies, Litia, informs Hajime`s band of ability users, Fallen Black, that an organization known as F is fighting against the war, tasking Hajime with crushing it. While Hajime is meeting up with July, his second-in-command, Hitomi Saito, leads the group in attacking F`s base, encountering a mysterious girl allegedly possessing an unstoppable ability, though Hajime soon explains this girl is actually a new member known as System. Back in the present, it is revealed that Hajime`s group kidnapped Hatoko by mistake whilst trying to obtain Sayumi for her healing ability. Meanwhile, Sayumi uses her Root of Origin to return the Literature Club back to its original state, teleporting Hatoko back to their side safely, after which Tomoyo clears up the confusion Hatoko had while July apologizes in his own way. While trying to open a bag of potato chips, July`s "Dark and Dark" awakens its next evolution. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 戦争[ホルムガングバトル]

REGULAR.description:
While asking July for some feedback on her completed novel, Tomoyo becomes embarrassed when she hears about a certain silver-wigged girl who convinced July to continue his chunibyo lifestyle. Later, after the girls make July to promise never to use his awakened power ever again, Hatoko helps Tomoyo with her studies. The next day, July makes a promise with Chifuyu to take her to the pool during summer break, with Chifuyu learning that she may have developed feelings for him, while another male classmate, Sagami Shizumu, approaches Sayumi with the prospect of getting together with July. Meanwhile, Hatoko reveals to Tomoyo that she is in love with July, asking if she also feels the same. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 布告[ガールズアプローチ]

REGULAR.description:
As July goes on his pool date with Chifuyu, Madoka tries to concoct a plan to get Chifuyu to hate July. However, July overcomes her expectations each time, leaving Madoka to become impressed by him as well. The next day, Sayumi brings July to the very same pool, where Shizumu equips her with a swimsuit that would allegedly become see-through if she gets wet. Later that night, Tomoyo tries inviting July to the pool, only to learn he is going on a family vacation with Hatoko.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 迷路[フールズラビリンス]

REGULAR.description:
Tomoyo recalls how she first met July during her chunibyo days. Hatoko tries to follow a magazine`s advice to get July to fall for her during their vacation, though not to much success. Upon his return, July invites Tomoyo to a summer festival where they talk things out and watch the fireworks together, leading Tomoyo to realise she is also in love with July. The next day, Mirei, who was captured by Hitomi the previous night, summons the literature club members together and steals Hatoko`s ability, using it against her. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 存在[キューピッドエラー]

REGULAR.description:
Mirei steals Chifuyu`s ability when she uses it protect Hatoko, before Tomoyo helps everyone to escape. Regrouping at a karaoke box, the group deduce that the Mirei they fought against was an imposter possessing her body. July goes by himself to confront the imposter, tricking her into stealing his enhanced "Dark and Dark of the End", which only serves to burn its user`s hand with a neverending flame that cannot be extinguished. This forces the imposter to return Mirei to her body, after which they use Chifuyu`s powers to chop off the burning hands and send them to another dimension whilst Sayumi heals them. Following the incident, Tomoyo and Hatoko discuss their respective feelings for July, before everyone returns to their everyday lives. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: 日常[ユージュアルデイズ]

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 異能バトルは日常系のなかで

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

4176.name: OP and ED sung by cast

titles.title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
異能バトルは日常系のなかで
Quand les batailles surnaturelles deviennent ordinaires
